East Anglian BBA Spring Festival (Section 2) 510 Test Piece Contest East Anglian BBA Spring Festival east-anglian-bba-section-2

Recollections of Weber
The Palace, Chatteris, Cambridgeshire Hymn tune contest held in conjunction with sections 1 and 3 - 1st Soham Comrades, 2nd Chatteris Town, 3rd divided between Fakenham Town and Royston Town. 4 bands competed.
Jan. 27, 2014, 1:45 p.m. Jan. 24, 2019, 12:25 p.m.
1 Castleton Brass [Suffolk] J. Singleton
2 Fakenham Town Band Edgar Ruffles
3 Hilgay Silver A. P. Setchfield
4 Royston Town F. Greenhill
